attributes.action: prisoners assets to be used for their prison costs/costs saved to provide free care homes for the elderly
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to seize assets from law breakers that are sent to prison to self fund their care in prison and to use the money saved to provide free healthcare for people needing care homes, also why does wales and Scotland get free care, free prescriptions etc, feel free to sign up and protest people, its the only way to win.
